item.title: Is Obesity in Children With Cancer Tied to Worse Survival? - Medscape
item.description:
Is Obesity in Children With Cancer Tied to Worse Survival?

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Cancer

Overall, obesity at the time of cancer diagnosis is independently associated with worse survival outcomes in pediatric patients, particularly in those with acute lymphoblastic leukemia and CNS tumors.

  • The study analyzed data from 11,291 pediatric cancer patients.
  • Obesity was observed in 10.5% of the cohort at diagnosis.
  • An adjusted hazard ratio indicated a 1.16 increase in risk for event-free survival and 1.29 for overall survival for obese patients.
  • Children with acute lymphoblastic leukemia saw significantly lower 5-year event-free survival rates (84.5% vs 89.8%) and overall survival rates (89.8% vs 94.4%).
  • In CNS tumor patients, obesity was associated with lower 5-year event-free and overall survival rates.
  • No significant associations were found for patients with lymphomas or non-CNS solid tumors.
“Although obesity at cancer diagnosis was independently associated with inferior survival across the entire cohort, this finding was likely driven by the trends detected in children with ALL [acute lymphoblastic leukemia] and CNS tumors,”

Overall, this study highlights the complex relationship between obesity and cancer outcomes in children, emphasizing the need for further research.

item.title: Mahakumbh 2025 Live: Sea of people descend at Triveni Sangam on Makar Sankranti - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Mahakumbh 2025 Live: Sea of people descend at Triveni Sangam on Makar Sankranti

Date: January 14, 2025

Source: Hindustan Times

The grand 45-day Mahakumbh 2025 event has commenced in Prayagraj, Uttar Pradesh, expected to attract 45 crore participants.

  • Over one crore devotees participated in the holy dip on the first day.
  • Uttar Pradesh DGP confirmed the use of AI and modern technologies for crowd management.
  • Key 'snan' dates include Makar Sankranti, Mauni Amavasya, and Maha Shivaratri.
“Everything is under control,” said UP DGP Prashant Kumar regarding the management of the event.

The event represents a significant cultural gathering, promoting unity and a message of “Vasudhaiva Kutumbakam,” affirming that the world is one family.

item.title: Inside the ISS: NASA Crew’s Thrilling Week of Spacewalks and Scientific Breakthroughs - SciTechDaily
item.description:
Inside the ISS: NASA Crew’s Thrilling Week of Spacewalks and Scientific Breakthroughs

Publication Date: Unspecified
Source: SciTech Daily

NASA astronauts are preparing for the first spacewalk of the year aboard the International Space Station (ISS). The Expedition 72 crew is conducting research in various scientific fields while simultaneously preparing for critical maintenance operations in space.

  • Flight Engineer Nick Hague and Commander Suni Williams are set to perform a six-and-a-half-hour spacewalk to work on instruments such as the NICER X-ray telescope.
  • They are also focusing on improving spacecraft safety by studying combustion and flame spread in microgravity.
  • Research on plant growth under different water levels is underway to aid food supply for long-term missions.
  • Emergency preparedness activities include inspecting safety gear and conducting evacuation training.
  • The crew is also engaged in human physiology studies to understand blood flow in microgravity.
“Understanding how flames spread in space may improve fire safety on crew missions.”

The ISS serves as a critical platform for advancing our scientific knowledge and capabilities, marking significant steps toward future long-term space missions.

item.title: Why rupee breached 86 against US dollar: strengthening dollar, weak FII inflows - The Indian Express
item.description:
Why rupee breached 86 against US dollar: strengthening dollar, weak FII inflows

Date: January 2025
Source: Indian Express

The rupee has fallen past 86 against the US dollar due to a strong dollar, rising crude oil prices, and continued foreign investment outflows.

  • The rupee opened at a record low of 86.12, dropping to 86.31 during trading.
  • High crude oil prices and selling by foreign investors are major contributors to the rupee's depreciation.
  • US jobs data showed a stronger-than-expected increase, influencing expectations for Federal Reserve interest rate policies.
  • Approximately $4.2 billion exited Indian markets in January 2025, exacerbating the rupee's decline.
  • Brent crude prices surged to USD 81.23 per barrel, affecting India's current account.
  • The rupee is expected to trade between 85.80 and 86.50 amid market volatility.
“This sustained decline reflects a combination of global and domestic pressures.” - Amit Pabari, Managing Director of CR Forex Advisors

This situation highlights the vulnerabilities of the rupee amidst global economic shifts and local market dynamics.

item.title: Arvind Kejriwal's big claim ahead of Delhi election: ‘BJP distributing gold chains for votes’ - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Kejriwal Accuses BJP of Buying Votes with Gold Chains Ahead of Delhi Elections

Date: January 14, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

In a press conference, Aam Aadmi Party (AAP) leader Arvind Kejriwal alleged that the BJP is distributing gold chains to buy votes in the upcoming Delhi assembly elections. He has urged voters not to sell their votes under any circumstances.

  • Kejriwal claimed BJP leaders are openly attempting to buy votes with cash and gifts.
  • He warned voters against accepting any monetary incentives from political parties.
  • Kejriwal called out the BJP for not having a clear vision or chief ministerial candidate.
  • The AAP leader stated that the distribution of gifts is a tactic to manipulate voter behavior.
  • BJP's Manoj Tiwari accused Kejriwal of breaking his promise to avoid alliances.
“I appeal to the public to take everything they are distributing but don't sell your vote.” - Arvind Kejriwal

This election is critical for the future political landscape of Delhi, and the accusations of vote buying raise significant questions about electoral integrity.

item.title: In Photos: Mars Devoured By ‘Wolf Moon’ In Stunning Sight For U.S. Sky-Watchers - Forbes
item.description:
Mars Devoured By ‘Wolf Moon’ In Spectacular Sky Event

Date: January 13, 2025   Source: Forbes

The first full moon of 2025, known as the 'Wolf Moon,' was witnessed by sky-watchers in North America as it briefly blocked Mars during a lunar occultation.

  • The occultation lasted for about an hour, obscuring Mars from view.
  • This rare celestial event coincided with Mars being the closest to Earth since December 2022.
  • Mars reached opposition on January 15, making it fully illuminated.
  • The phenomenon was a visual illusion caused by the moon crossing the ecliptic plane.
  • Observers noted the relative distances: Mars was 59.7 million miles away while the moon was 224,000 miles distant.
Mars appeared fully illuminated and brighter than at any other time since December 2022, despite being outshone by Venus.

The 'Wolf Moon' is traditionally associated with January and has several alternative names, including the Stay Home Moon and Snow Moon, with the next full moon set for February 12, 2025.

item.title: Samsung Galaxy Ring to get two new sizes, improved sleep tracking features and more later this month - Moneycontrol
item.description:
Samsung Galaxy Ring to Get New Sizes and Enhanced Sleep Tracking Features

January 14, 2025 / Moneycontrol

Ahead of the Galaxy Unpacked 2025 event, Samsung has announced the introduction of two new larger sizes for the Galaxy Ring along with enhanced sleep tracking features via the Samsung Health app.

  • The Galaxy Ring will now range from sizes 5 to 15, with new sizes (14 and 15) available from January 22.
  • Expanded availability in 15 new markets starting in February, bringing total markets to 53.
  • Updates to the Samsung Health app will include enhanced sleep tracking capabilities.
  • New features include a sleep environment report and suggestions for ideal bedtimes based on user habits.
  • A mindfulness tracker will also be introduced for mood monitoring and relaxation exercises.

item.title: Best time to buy iPhone 16 for less than Rs 70000: Republic Day Sale on Flipkart and Amazon is live - India TV News
item.description:
Best time to buy iPhone 16 for less than Rs 70000: Republic Day Sale on Flipkart and Amazon is live

Publication Date: January 2025 | Source: India TV News

The Republic Day Sale 2025 has started, revealing a significant price drop for the Apple iPhone 16. It's now available for Rs 69,999, making it a great opportunity for consumers to purchase the premium smartphone.

Key Points:

  • The iPhone 16 (128 GB) is priced at Rs 69,999, down from Rs 79,900.
  • Features include the A18 chipset, a new action button for quick feature access, and enhanced camera controls.
  • AI features include iOS 18 tools like Genmoji and Image Playground.

"A number of glitches and issues were discovered by some experts and Apple enthusiasts."

In conclusion, while the price drop offers an appealing deal for the iPhone 16, potential buyers should consider user reports of issues with the device before making a purchase.

item.title: Watch: Good Old Times As Rohit Sharma Bats With Ajinkya Rahane In Mumbai's Ranji Trophy Session - NDTV Sports
item.description:
Rohit Sharma Returns to Mumbai Ranji Trophy Team Training with Ajinkya Rahane

Publication Date: January 14, 2025 | Source: NDTV

In a bid to regain form after a disappointing Test series in Australia, Rohit Sharma has joined the Mumbai Ranji Trophy team's nets session and practiced alongside Ajinkya Rahane.

  • Rohit Sharma managed only 31 runs in three Tests during the Border-Gavaskar Trophy against Australia.
  • He attended a review meeting on Sunday with the head coach and BCCI officials to discuss the team's performance.
  • The Mumbai Ranji team is set to play Jammu and Kashmir on January 23, which is crucial for advancing in the tournament.
  • Rohit last played for Mumbai in 2015 and it is uncertain if he will feature in the upcoming match.
“Rohit Sharma is back where it all began—training with the Mumbai Ranji team! Preparation, passion, and focus in full swing.” — Star Sports

Rohit's recent performance has been under scrutiny, and his participation in the upcoming matches will be closely watched as he aims to revive his career.

item.title: King, Garth dismantle England as Australia extend Ashes lead in low-scoring win - ESPNcricinfo
item.description:
Australia's Dramatic Victory Over England in Ashes ODI

Publication Date: N/A Source: ESPN Cricinfo

Australia managed to beat England by 21 runs in a low-scoring match, with Alana King shining with 4 wickets to lead her team to victory while defending a mere total of 180 runs.

  • Australia scored 180 runs, with Ellyse Perry top-scoring at 60.
  • England was bowled out for 159, with Amy Jones scoring 47 not out.
  • Alana King and Kim Garth led the bowling attack for Australia with 4 for 25 and 3 for 37, respectively.
  • This match marked the lowest successful defense in an Ashes ODI.
  • England's players contributed to their own downfall with poor decisions and execution.
"Having the Shane Warne stand now, yeah, it was pretty surreal to be quite honest, but more happy to get the win." - Alana King

The match showcased a stunning collapse from both teams, but ultimately Australia extended their lead in the multi-format series.

item.title: iPhone 16 drops to OnePlus 13’s price – Which phone should you buy this Republic Day Sale? | Mint - Mint
item.description:
iPhone 16 drops to OnePlus 13’s price – Which phone should you buy this Republic Day Sale?

Publication Date: Not specified
Source: LiveMint

Apple's iPhone 16 is now on sale for ₹69,999 during the Republic Day Sale, making it comparably priced to the OnePlus 13. This article explores the specifications and features of both flagship smartphones to help consumers decide which to purchase.

iPhone 16 price cut in India:

The iPhone 16, available for ₹69,999, features the A18 chipset, support for iOS 18, and enhanced AI capabilities. It was originally launched at ₹79,900.

iPhone 16 specifications:

  • A18 chipset with 30% faster CPU and 40% faster GPU.
  • New Action Button for quick feature access.
  • Latest iOS 18 with AI features.

OnePlus 13 specifications:

  • 6.82-inch 120Hz ProXDR display.
  • Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Elite processor.
  • 6,000mAh battery with fast charging features.

The OnePlus 13 offers a competitive display and battery life, while the iPhone 16 promises longer software support and unique Apple features.

“Apple fanatics really only have one option in this price range, and that is the iPhone 16.”

Ultimately, consumer preference between iOS and Android may dictate the choice between these two devices.

item.title: 7 impressive images of star clusters shared by NASA - India.com
item.description:
7 Impressive Images of Star Clusters Shared by NASA

Publication Date: N/A Source: India.com

NASA has shared stunning images of various star clusters. Here are a few of these captivating shots.

  • The bright glow of the globular cluster NGC 2031 shines in the Mensa constellation within the Large Magellanic Cloud (LMC).
  • NGC 2031 is a 100-million-year-old globular cluster, born in the Large Magellanic Cloud, known for being a stellar nursery.
  • NGC 2660 is a glittering group of stars in the Vela constellation.
  • The bright star NGC 1858 is a 10-million-year-old open star cluster in the Large Magellanic Cloud.
  • Hubble shows a loose collection of stars from the open cluster Caldwell 71.
  • NGC 2002 is an open star cluster located approximately 160,000 light-years from Earth.
  • In the Trapezium embedded cluster within the Orion Nebula, young stars shine brightly through dense clouds of gas and dust.
“Thanks for reading!”

These images showcase the beauty and complexity of star clusters, reminding us of the wonders of the universe.

item.title: ‘Over 3000 special trains, 554 ticketing counters, 1176 CCTV cameras’- Indian Railways plan to cater the Mahakumbh - The Indian Express
item.description:
‘Over 3000 special trains, 554 ticketing counters, 1176 CCTV cameras’- Indian Railways plan to cater the Mahakumbh

Date: January 14, 2025 Source: Indian Express

Indian Railways has prepared an extensive plan to accommodate the expected influx of pilgrims for the Maha Kumbh 2025, which is projected to attract around 40 crore visitors.

  • Over 3,000 special trains will be operational, significantly increasing capacity compared to the 2019 Ardh Kumbh.
  • A total of 554 ticketing counters, including mobile Unreserved Ticketing System (UTS) counters, have been set up.
  • 1176 CCTV cameras have been installed at key stations for real-time monitoring of passenger safety.
  • 12-language announcement systems will assist diverse pilgrims at major stations.
  • Infrastructure investments totaling Rs. 3700 crore have facilitated vital projects to enhance accessibility.
“An investment of Rs. 5,000 crore has been made over the past three years for Kumbh-related projects.”

The preparations reflect the Indian Railways' commitment to provide safe and efficient services for the Mahakumbh, addressing the needs of millions of attendees.

item.title: Adani Power, Adani Green to Adani Enterprises — Why are Adani group shares skyrocketing? EXPLAINED | Stock Market News - Mint
item.description:
Adani Power, Adani Green to Adani Enterprises — Why are Adani group shares skyrocketing? EXPLAINED

Publication Date: January 14

Source: Live Mint

Shares of Adani group companies have seen significant increases in trading on January 14, with all ten companies experiencing gains, particularly Adani Power, which rose over 18%.

  • Adani Power shares surged to ₹532.95, leading gains.
  • Adani Energy Solutions and Adani Green Energy increased by over 12% each.
  • Speculation around fundraising plans is driving the rise in stock prices, according to market experts.
  • Donald Trump's potential return to the White House is believed to facilitate overseas fundraising for the Adani group.
  • Analysts recommend caution for new investors given the speculative nature of these gains.
“The market expects Donald Trump's re-entry at the White House to make it easier for the Adani group to raise overseas funds.” - Anshul Jain, Head of Research at Lakshmishree Investment and Securities

Market analysts suggest investors wait for an official statement from the Adani group before making new purchases, emphasizing the speculative nature of the stock increases.

item.title: Amitabh Bachchan Calmed Rekha, Told Her 'It's Just Acting' During 'I Hate You' Scene: 'I Hugged Amitji...' - News18
item.description:
Amitabh Bachchan Calmed Rekha, Told Her 'It's Just Acting' During 'I Hate You' Scene: 'I Hugged Amitji...'

Date: January 14, 2025 | Source: News18

In a revealing interview, Rekha recounted how Amitabh Bachchan supported her during a challenging scene in the film Silsila. Despite nerves and a large audience, Bachchan's words helped her deliver the performance.

  • Amitabh Bachchan, Rekha, and Jaya Bachchan starred in the 1981 movie Silsila.
  • Rekha had to perform an emotional scene with 15,000 people present.
  • Bachchan shared advice from James Dean to help calm Rekha's nerves.
  • Rekha expressed gratitude for Bachchan's reassuring words during filming.
  • The audience reacted emotionally to the scene, leading to a memorable moment.
“It was such an intense scene... I said to Amitji, ‘Excuse me, that really makes me feel better.’ He said, ‘I don’t mean it literally, but you know what I mean, come on. This is acting.’”

The support from Amitabh Bachchan during a critical moment highlights the importance of camaraderie in the film industry, showcasing their longstanding professional bond and on-screen chemistry.

item.title: Carl Pei to launch Nothing Phone (3) and ‘landmark’ device in 2025, leaked email confirms - Moneycontrol
item.description:
Carl Pei to launch Nothing Phone (3) and ‘landmark’ device in 2025, leaked email confirms

Date: January 14, 2025

Source: Moneycontrol

Nothing has big plans for 2025. According to a leaked email from CEO Carl Pei, the company will launch the Nothing Phone (3) as a flagship device this year. He also hinted at a “landmark” device but did not provide details, suggesting an exciting year for Nothing fans.

Key Points:

  • The Nothing Phone (3) is confirmed to be launched in 2025.
  • A landmark smartphone launch is also expected in Q1 2025.
  • This will be the first flagship device since the launch of Phone (2).
“2025: Nothing’s Year of Innovation” - Carl Pei

This year is set to be significant for the brand, promising new innovations and a possible revival in the flagship segment.

item.title: Watch: India Star Climbs Tirupati Stairs On Knees After Return From BGT - NDTV Sports
item.description:
India Star Climbs Tirupati Stairs On Knees After Return From BGT

Publication Date: January 14, 2025 Source: NDTV

Nitish Kumar Reddy, despite Team India losing the Border-Gavaskar Trophy series, gained attention for his impressive performance and his heartfelt devotion shown by climbing the stairs of Tirupati temple on his knees.

  • Team India lost the Border-Gavaskar Trophy series 1-3 against Australia despite winning the first test.
  • Nitish Kumar Reddy scored a century (114 runs) in his debut series, becoming a notable performer for the Indian team.
  • He expressed his devotion at the Tirupati temple post-series by climbing the temple stairs on his knees.
  • Reddy received a warm welcome at Visakhapatnam airport upon his return, celebrating with fans and family.
  • In the series, he was India's second-highest run-scorer, accumulating a total of 298 runs.
Nitish Kumar Reddy climbing stairs of Tirupati after scoring ton in his debut series. The peace is in the feet of Govinda — Pari (@BluntIndianGal) January 13, 2025

Nitish Reddy's performance has resonated positively with fans, showcasing both his cricketing talent and his personal devotion.

item.title: Delhi Police to probe Arvind Kejriwal's allegations against BJP's Parvesh Verma: Election official - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Delhi Police to Investigate Kejriwal's Claims Against BJP's Parvesh Verma

Date: January 14, 2025 Source: Hindustan Times

The New Delhi district election officer has passed complaints from the Aam Aadmi Party against BJP candidate Parvesh Verma for alleged violations of the electoral moral code, forwarding them to the police for investigation.

  • Kejriwal accuses Verma of cash distribution and organizing job camps illegally.
  • The police are investigating the allegations under the Representation of Peoples Act.
  • No evidence of the alleged job camps has been found by election officials.
  • Kejriwal alleges collusion between local election officers and BJP, as well as voter deletions from rolls.
“These things come under corrupt practices under the rules and regulations of the Election Commission...” - Arvind Kejriwal

This investigation underscores ongoing tensions in the Delhi election landscape, highlighting serious allegations regarding electoral integrity.

item.title: Minister Lakshmi Hebbalkar injured in car accident, hospitalised - Daijiworld.com
item.description:
Minister Lakshmi Hebbalkar injured in car accident, hospitalised

Date: January 14 | Source: Daijiworld Media Network

Minister Lakshmi Hebbalkar and her brother, MLC Channaraj Hattiholi, were involved in a car accident near Ambadagatti village in Kittur taluk, Belagavi district, in the early morning hours.

  • The accident occurred around 6 am on January 14.
  • The duo was returning to Belagavi after a party meeting in Bengaluru.
  • The vehicle hit a tree while trying to avoid a dog.
  • Minister Hebbalkar sustained minor injuries, while Hattiholi suffered a head injury.
  • Both were taken to a private hospital for treatment.
“The front portion of the car was heavily damaged due to the impact of the collision.”

The incident has raised concerns regarding road safety and the importance of caution while driving.

item.title: Happy Makar Sankranti 2025: Wishes, images, quotes, WhatsApp status, messages, photos and greetings - The Indian Express
item.description:
Happy Makar Sankranti 2025: Wishes, Images, Quotes, WhatsApp Status, Messages, Photos and Greetings

Date: January 14, 2025
Source: Indian Express

India celebrates Makar Sankranti, a Hindu festival symbolizing longer days and warmer nights, which signifies a shift in agricultural cycles and worships Lord Surya. This year’s celebration occurs on January 14, 2025, from 09:03 AM to 05:46 PM.

  • Celebrated with kite flying, bonfires, and regional delicacies.
  • Involves spiritual practices like bathing in holy rivers.
  • Gifts include greetings, wishes, and cards shared amongst family and friends.
“Wishing you a prosperous and joyful Makar Sankranti! May your life soar as high as the kites in the sky.”

Makar Sankranti is a festival that represents hope and togetherness, filling hearts with joy and warmth.

item.title: ‘Over 3000 special trains, 554 ticketing counter, 1176 CCTV cameras’- Indian Railways plan to cater the Mahakumbh - The Indian Express
item.description:
‘Over 3000 special trains, 554 ticketing counters, 1176 CCTV cameras’- Indian Railways plan to cater the Mahakumbh

Date: January 14, 2025 | Source: The Indian Express

The Indian Railways has announced extensive preparations for the Maha Kumbh 2025, including the operation of 3,000 special trains and installation of numerous facilities to accommodate millions of pilgrims attending the event.

  • More than 3,000 special trains are being organized, 4.5 times the number during the last Ardh Kumbh.
  • A total of 554 ticketing counters, including 151 mobile UTS counters, will be available for ease of access.
  • Installation of 1,176 CCTV cameras for real-time monitoring across major stations.
  • A 12-language announcement system will assist pilgrims at key locations.
  • A dedicated war room will oversee operations to ensure safety and efficiency.
“The total cost of these projects are Rs. 3700 crore. The key section connecting to the Sangam and adjoining areas have been completed. The work on other sections is ongoing,” said a senior official.

The efforts aim to provide safe and seamless travel for the estimated 40 crore pilgrims expected to visit, particularly on significant dates like Mauni Amavasya.
